about_the_game:
An unrelenting evil spirit stalks you at every turn as you search for ancient totems to complete a ritual of protection. Explore a world shrouded in danger, evade its deadly pursuit, and uncover secrets that draw you deeper into the darkness. Will you restore peace or fall victim to a fatal pursuit?

Features

  • World: Explore an environment combining rocky terrain, dense forests and remnants of urban decay. Everywhere contains clues, obstacles and opportunities to help you survive.

  • Avoid the chase: outsmart your pursuer by creatively utilizing the environment. Lure him, go around and use the objects around you to win precious seconds.

  • Solve challenging puzzles: find clues, solve them in a rush and constant stress to advance your journey.

  • Developing threat: the Spirit is constantly observing and adapting, creating tense and unpredictable situations that keep you in suspense.

  • Breathtaking atmosphere: plunge into a dystopian world - visual effects, mesmerizing soundscapes and dynamic pressure will engage you in a fight for survival.

Ritual

Totems are the key to restoring balance, but collecting them won't be easy. With each step forward, the spirit becomes more and more desperate to stop you. The question is not only whether you can survive, but how far you will go to bring the ritual to completion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-1135G7 / AMD Ryzen 3 5300U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
